name: UCameraModifier
doc:
A CameraModifier is a base class for objects that may adjust the final camera properties after
being computed by the APlayerCameraManager (@see ModifyCamera). A CameraModifier
can be stateful, and is associated uniquely with a specific APlayerCameraManager.

Priority: Priority value that determines the order in which modifiers are applied. 0 = highest priority, 255 = lowest.
CameraOwner: Camera this object is associated with.
AlphaInTime: When blending in, alpha proceeds from 0 to 1 over this time
AlphaOutTime: When blending out, alpha proceeds from 1 to 0 over this time
bDebug: If true, enables certain debug visualization features.
bExclusive: If true, no other modifiers of same priority allowed.

methods.name: BlueprintModifyCamera
BlueprintModifyPostProcess
DisableModifier
methods.doc:
Disables this modifier.
@param  bImmediate  - true to disable with no blend out, false (default) to allow blend out

methods.name: GetViewTarget
methods.doc: @return Returns the actor the camera is currently viewing.

methods.name: IsDisabled
methods.doc: @return Returns true if modifier is disabled, false otherwise.

methods.name: IsPendingDisable
methods.doc: @return Returns true if modifier is pending disable, false otherwise.
